Coach( Dean) Wilder Smith told me a long time ago that if you can't accept that players win and coaches lose, then don't get into coaching. You can be the greatest coach in the world, but if you don't have players, you aren't going to win in the NBA. George Karl has a superstar in Allen Iverson , who finished with 44 points and 10 assists.
